meanings.definition: A luxurious apartment or dwelling situated on the top floor of a building.
meanings.sent1: The penthouses in the building offer stunning views of the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: Many wealthy people choose to live in penthouses for the beautiful views.
meanings.sent3: The penthouses in the building are so fancy, even the birds envy them.
meanings.sent4: Living in the penthouses feels like being on top of the world.
meanings.sent5: The penthouses are like luxurious nests in the sky.

meanings.definition: The top floor of a building, typically set back from the outer walls.
meanings.sent1: On the top floor, the penthouses are set back, giving them a unique layout.
meanings.sent2: The penthouses on the upper level have a special design compared to the lower floors.
meanings.sent3: The penthouses at the top seem to play hide and seek with the rest of the building.
meanings.sent4: The penthouses, like secret hideaways, are tucked away from the edges.
meanings.sent5: The penthouses at the top are like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
